techmeme.title: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang says a flaw in Blackwell AI chips that impacted production has been fixed with TSMC's help and the issue was "100% Nvidia's fault" (Reuters)
Privacy advocates leak hours of footage of Locate X, a global, warrantless phone tracking tool made by Babel Street and used by US agencies like ICE and CBP (Joseph Cox/404 Media)
Source: in mid-October, TSMC halted shipments to a client after it discovered that chips fabricated for that entity had found their way into Huawei products (Debby Wu/Bloomberg)
China says Tim Cook said Apple would "continue to grow its investments in China" in a meeting with its top tech official, during his second visit in 2024 (Debby Wu/Bloomberg)
Nigeria drops charges against Binance executive Tigran Gambaryan, detained since February 2024; sources say the case was discontinued due to his ill health (Nduka Orjinmo/Bloomberg)
